speaker: PELOSI
sentence: Border security is a way to effectively honor our responsibilities.
politifact_statement: Schumer "The experts say you can do this without a wall."
verified_claim: Here are the facts there is no massive wave of migrants pouring into California. Overall immigrant apprehensions on the border last year were as low as theyve been in nearly 50 years and 85 percent of the apprehensions occurred outside of California.
verified_claim_article_title: Jerry Brown says theres no massive wave of migrants pouring into California. Is he right?  PolitiFact Californ

speaker: TRUMP
sentence: We caught 10 terrorists over the last very short period of time.
